text: The 1990 Nippon Professional Baseball season was the 41st season of operation for the league. ==Regular season standings== ===Central League=== {| class="wikitable" width="50%" style="text-align:center;" ! width="35%" | Central Leaguehttp://npb.jp/bis/yearly/centralleague_1990.html ! width="5%" | G ! width="5%" | W ! width="5%" | L ! width="5%" | T ! width="7%" | Pct. ! width="5%" | GB |- align=center |- style="background-color:#fdd" |Yomiuri Giants || 130 || 88 || 42 || 0 || .677 || -- |- align=center |Hiroshima Toyo Carp || 132 || 66 || 64 || 2 || .508 || 22.0 |- align=center |Yokohama Taiyo Whales || 133 || 64 || 66 || 3 || .492 || 24.0 |- align=center |Chunichi Dragons || 131 || 62 || 68 || 1 || .477 || 26.0 |- align=center |Yakult Swallows || 130 || 58 || 72 || 0 || .446 || 30.0 |- align=center |Hanshin Tigers || 130 || 52 || 78 || 0 || .400 || 36.0 |} ===Pacific League=== {| class="wikitable" width="50%" style="text-align:center;" ! width="35%" | Pacific Leaguehttp://npb.jp/bis/yearly/pacificleague_1990.html ! width="5%" | G ! width="5%" | W ! width="5%" | L ! width="5%" | T ! width="7%" | Pct. ! width="5%" | GB |- align=center |- style="background-color:#fdd" |Seibu Lions || 130 || 81 || 45 || 4 || .643 || -- |- align=center |Orix Braves || 130 || 69 || 57 || 4 || .548 || 12.0 |- align=center |Kintetsu Buffaloes || 130 || 67 || 60 || 3 || .528 || 14.5 |- align=center |Nippon-Ham Fighters || 130 || 66 || 63 || 1 || .512 || 16.5 |- align=center |Lotte Orions || 130 || 57 || 71 || 2 || .445 || 25.0 |- align=center |Fukuoka Daiei Hawks || 130 || 41 || 85 || 4 || .325 || 40.0 |} ==Japan Series== ==See also== *1990 Major League Baseball season ==References== Category:1990 in baseball Category:1990 in Japanese sport
